effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. Additionally, Frostscythe deals 40% more damage to the first target struck.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,204 and Haste by 8,068.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 297,781, and Strength by 7,537.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,979 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 184 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,883 to 4,746 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,746 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
